title: Puterjs - Free, Serverless, Cloud and AI
content: Puter.js is a frontend-only JavaScript SDK that lets you ship full-stack apps without stitching together five different services. It provides auth, cloud storage, databse, GPT-4o, o1, o30min, Claude, DALL-E & more through a single JS library.
